class.name: ShaderIncludeDB
class.brief_description: Internal database of built in shader include files.
class.description: This object contains shader fragments from Godot's internal shaders. These can be used when access to internal uniform buffers and/or internal functions is required for instance when composing compositor effects or compute shaders. Only fragments for the current rendering device are loaded.

method.name: get_built_in_include_file
method.description: Returns the code for the built-in shader fragment. You can also access this in your shader code through [code]#include "filename"[/code].

method.name: has_built_in_include_file
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if an include file with this name exists.

method.name: list_built_in_include_files
method.description: Returns a list of built-in include files that are currently registered.
